title: What is a better CPU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well the answer is the i7–7700, the i5–7600k could potentially beat it with overclocking and proper cooling. As new games come with Multi threaded API’s like DirectX 12/Vulkan the demand for more threads will supersede the “4 Core limit”. Granted in the end a Ryzen 5 1600X would be better in the long run, however to be king of the Short term the i7–7700k then the i5–7600k (OC’d) these are for games that are DirectX 11 and below. The i7–7700 comes with heat-sink and fan. As to the Fan’s typically the K series don’t have them. Good Luck!
